name: Minute Of Your Time
description:
Minute of Your Time is a Couch Co-op auto scroller. In it, you and three friends will be facing off against an army of green cubes. Suit up, Minute of Your Time contains a huge arsenal of guns with all sorts of uses. 

Product Info

Players: 1-4 (2 minimum recommended)

Difficulty: Moderate-Hard

Required Hardware: 2 Controllers (For 4 Player)

<<ONLINE>> 

Scheduled for with the steam release
